thread.title: Dakota Johnson wears Victorian-style frock in Madrid | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Dakota Johnson wears Victorian-style frock in Madrid | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Dakota Johnson wears Victorian-style frock in Madrid | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 369 shares Dakota's sleek, dark tresses fell straight over her shoulders and her deep red lips were the perfect shade to complement the outfit. She brightened her pale complexion with a touch of colour on her cheeks, while her piercing green eyes needed no help standing out. Vintage: The actress put on a classy display in a pale pink Victorian-inspired dress with a skirt which boasted tiered ruffles Teamwork: Joining her on the red carpet was co-star Jamie Dornan, director James Foley and writer E.L. James Screen stars: Sporting a shaven head, Jamie looked dapper in a black suit with a brown belt Rugged: Jamie sported a well-groomed beard and looked relaxed with his hands in his pockets The star posed with her hand on her hip and waved at the cameras. Joining her on the red carpet was co-star Jamie Dornan, director James Foley and writer E.L. James. Sporting a shaven head, Jamie looked dapper in a black suit with a brown belt. He shared laughs with Dakota, the pair looking like they've become firm friends through their work on the franchise. The film's cast has reportedly been banned from being 'overtly sexual' on social media and interviews. Strike a pose: The star posed with her hand on her hip and waved at the cameras. Joining her on the red carpet was co-star Jamie Dornan, director James Foley and writer E.L. James Laughing out loud: Dakota and Jamie shared smiles as she whispered something funny to him Stunning: Dakota's sleek, dark tresses fell straight over her shoulders and her deep red lips were the perfect shade to complement the outfit Keep it light: The film's cast has reportedly been banned from being 'overtly sexual' on social media and interviews Glamorous: She brightened her pale complexion with a touch of colour on her cheeks, while her piercing green eyes needed no help standing out Handsome chap: Jamie was pictured heading out in London on Thursday ahead of the London premiere which is set to take place in the evening Lock away! Jamie appears to have started growing out his hair a little after he recently shaved it off According to Oscar-winning actress Marcia Gay Harden, who stars in the film as the mother of Jamie's character Christian Grey, she was reprimanded by movie bosses for her lewd talk. She told The Sun: 'We can't talk too much about nipple clamps. 'I used to send out some naughty little tweets... and I was told by Universal that I couldn't do it any more.' Sweet: E.L James put on a loving display with her husband Niall Leonard On-screen lovers: Jamie and Dakota looked friendly as they waited for the photographers to get their shots Raunchy chat: According to Oscar-winning actress Marcia Gay Harden, who stars in the film as the mother of Jamie's character Christian Grey, she was reprimanded by movie bosses for her lewd talk Open arms: Dakota's ensemble was certainly different, turning heads as she trod the red carpet Demure: The star waved to fans and photographers as she headed off into the screening Fiery: The back of Dakota's dress was rather out of kilter with the front of it, displaying a sequinned flame design Watch the dress: Dakota learnt that a flowing dress is often not the best option on the red carpet Team Grey: The lead actors, director and author posed for pictures as they celebrated the release of the raunchy sequel Share or comment on this article 369
